<TRIGGER id="${1}" type="${2|single,multi|}">
    <CASE when="=false" call="toast('Case 1')" />
    <CASE when="=true" call="toast('Case 2')" />
    <CASE when="=true" call="toast('Case 3')" />
</TRIGGER>
<BTN onclick="trigger('${1}')" label="trigger" />
TRIGGER (w/ button) [FML].description: A Trigger snippet with a button to trigger the case call(s)
